articles.author: Seun Opejobi
articles.title: Jeff Bezos hails Buhari’s leadership in Glasgow - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: American billionaire and founder of Amazon, Jeff Bezos, on Monday commended President Muhammadu Buhari's leadership role in restoring degraded lands in the country. Bezos described Buhari's commitment to restore four million hectares as exemplary. He joined B…
articles.content:
American billionaire and founder of Amazon, Jeff Bezos, on Monday commended President Muhammadu Buhari’s leadership role in restoring degraded lands in the country.
